comments: I took Spranos class in my first semester of college after graduating high school. His class was pretty difficult for me, and he was quite difficult to get an email response from, even during his listed office hours. Hes not the nicest teacher Ive had, and Im a decent student. He also doesnt exactly grade in a timely manner. Final grade: A

comments: This professor will almost never give you the answer to the question you ask. Its as if he\'s hearing something entirely different and his response will be to whatever that was. He unnecessarily shares his political and religious opinions; deliberately encouraging controversial and unrelated discussions among the students. He interrupts and demeans.

comments: To be honest his class is tough and a bit of a pain online. He organizes everything very well. Any of the times I didn\'t understand something or had a question, he responded to emails pretty quickly (except on weekends). To be honest he might be a little too good for the school. He has a ton of knowledge about the subject, he\'s just really tough.

comments: It has been almost two months since I have emailed him about a question in one of the chapters and I still haven\'t heard back from him even though he has been posting on Blackboard. No help at all. Also, it isn\'t laid out week-by-week. He gives you the last day everything is do and pretty much tells you good luck, bye. The material wasn\'t hard.

comments: If you have a chance, I would bypass this teacher if possible. He pokes fun at Christians and their beliefs in the classroom. He is very arrogant. He knows his subject and is a good teacher, but his attitude ruins it.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Tough Grader (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Extremely unorganized and difficult to communicate with. He is extremely subjective in his grading. Basically his you do not produce a derivative restatement of his own politics, you will be considered ignorant and failed. I strongly urge anyone who has to take an English class to take it from another professor. Horrible teacher.

comments: Peter is teaching at a college that is less than perfect. Not only is he insightful, but his level of psychology is evident in the work he assigns. It bothers me that students are so negative towards him, as I am sure he is estatic to teach such "folk."

comments: Mr. Sprano. . . . Horrible about grading papers, never responds to emails, isn\'t on campus during his posted hours, often unclear in his assignments. I can\'t think of any circumstance where I would recommend him.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Tough Grader (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I\'ve honestly never hated a Literature class until I had to take this one. I enjoy writing and reading the material, BUT he\'s completely unorganized and takes forever to respond to anything. Take the class with Martha, she\'d be a lot better then he is. His teaching style is very unique and keep up with the reading, honestly.

comments: It\'s best to skip this one and take Miss Holder. Sprano practices subjective grading. If he doesn\'t like your politics, he will fail you. Very progressive!!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Tough Grader (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I can understand why some students might not like him. He can be a bit slow to return emails and calls. However I know that he teaches a TON of classes at WCC and is working on his own education. So he is a busy guy. All in all I think he is an outstanding teacher. He lets you know what he expects right up front follow that and you will be do fine.
